snippet: The administration of President Goodluck Jonathan has been shockingly slow and inept at addressing the mass kidnappings of scores of schoolgirls.
abstract: Editorial criticizes government of Nigerian Pres Goodluck Jonathan for its ineffectual response to kidnappings of schoolgirls by radical group Boko Haram; urges Jonathan to accept help offered by Pres Obama, and warns that Nigeria's government cannot realize country's potential unless it contains the virulent insurgency.
lead_paragraph: The administration of President Goodluck Jonathan has been shockingly slow and inept at addressing the mass kidnappings of scores of schoolgirls.
